about_the_game:
This guide will show you the countless possibilities of the game and help you make the right decisions in every situation and successfully live your life as a farmer. Beginning with the start of the game, the missions to complete, little tips & tricks, many more information is included that will intensify your gaming experience many times over.

Content
  • Basics - your start into the game
  • Social life - your neighbors
  • Crops
  • Machines, animals, goods
  • Leisure activities
  • Tips, locations and achievements

Access
You can find the Official Guide in the Steam installation directory of the game in the "Official Guide Content " folder (Steam\steamapps\common\Farmer's Dynasty\Official Guide Content) after the download of the "Official Guide" DLC pack is complete.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo / AMD X2, min. 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, min. 1.5GB dedicated VRAM (AMD Radeon HD 7000 series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 500 series)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD X4, min. 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, min. 2GB dedicated VRAM (AMD R9 300 series / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 900 series)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
